### Evaluation guidelines

Grading criteria are given per project. They involve the following aspects:

| Criterion | Points  | Details |
|:----------|:-------:|:--------|
|Narrative, spelling and syntax |  | English/French {{<  fa pen-fancy >}}|
|Plots correction |  | choice of `aesthetics`, `geom`, `scale` ... {{<  fa chart-area >}}|
|Plots style |  | Titles, legends, labels, breaks ... {{<  fa chart-area >}} |
|Table wrangling |  | ETL, SQL like manipulations {{<  fa database >}} |
|Computing Statistics |  | Aggregations, LR, PCA, CA, ... {{<  fa chart-area >}} |
|DRY compliance |  | DRY principle at {{<  fa brands  wikipedia-w  >}} [ Wikipedia ](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don%27t_repeat_yourself)|
|Report organization| | {{< fa pen-to-square >}}|
|Code organization| | {{< fa code-pull-request >}} |




:::
